rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {PTY1011, PTY1022}
Must be enrolled in course version {3891, M3003}

description: The Honours Systematic Review  unit provides students with opportunities to advance their understanding of quality research methods, to learn systematic methods for developing a focused research question, seeking relevant information, critically appraising relevant research and preparing a summary of the review findings using contemporary methods. It provides direction and guidance to honours students in developing meaningful arguments to support proposed research activities. The review will contribute 15% to the final honours grade.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
